    "the _ law of the iterated logarithm _",

    "the functional counterpart to the law of the iterated logarithm was discovered by @xcite .",

    "another interesting ordinary limit theorem is _",
    "lvy s modulus of continuity _",
    "it states that @xmath24}\\frac{|b(t+u)-b(t)|}{\\sqrt{2u\\log u^{-1}}}=1\\quad\\mathsf{p}-\\text{a .",
    "s.}\\ ] ]    the corresponding functional counterpart was discovered by @xcite .",
    "define @xmath25.\\ ] ] then , in the uniform topology , the set of @xmath15-a .",
    "s. limit points of @xmath26 as @xmath27 is strassen s ball @xmath12 .",
    "lvy s modulus of continuity follows from its functional counterpart in the same way as the law of the iterated logarithm follows from strassen s law .",
    "in fact , @xcite contains a general functional limit theorem that includes the functional law of the iterated logaritm , the functional lvy s modulus of continuity and many other results as particular cases .",
    "our aim is to prove the analogue of the results of @xcite for the _ multiparameter fractional brownian motion_. this is the separable centred gaussian random field @xmath28 on the space @xmath29 with the covariance function @xmath30 where @xmath31 denotes the usual euclidean norm on the space @xmath29 .",
    "the parameter @xmath32 is called the _",
    "hurst parameter_. in particular , for @xmath33 and @xmath34 the multiparameter fractional brownian motion becomes @xmath35 where @xmath36 and @xmath37 are two independent copies of the brownian motion .    in section  [ formulation ]",
    "we formulate our results .",
    "they are proved in section  [ proofs ] .",
    "examples and applications are discussed in section  [ examples ] .",
    "in what follows , we write @xmath38 , if two random functions @xmath39 and @xmath40 are defined on the same space @xmath41 and have the same finite - dimensional distributions .",
    "we denote by @xmath42 the group of all orthogonal matrices on the space @xmath29 .",
    "[ l1 ] the multiparameter fractional brownian motion has the next properties .    1 .   [ pro1 ] it has homogeneous increments , i.e. , for any @xmath43 @xmath44 2 .",
    "[ pro2 ] it is self - similar , i.e. , for any @xmath45 @xmath46 3 .",

    "let @xmath353 be the linear space of all deterministic functions @xmath77 satisfying the condition @xmath354 it follows from that @xmath355 . by @xcite*section  9 , proposition  1 @xmath356 . from lemma  [ l2 ]",
    "we obtain the following bernstein - type theorem from approximation theory :"
  ],
  "abstract_text": [
    "<S> we prove a general functional limit theorem for multiparameter fractional brownian motion . </S>",
    "<S> the functional law of the iterated logarithm , functional lvy s modulus of continuity and many other results are its particular cases . </S>",
    "<S> applications to approximation theory are discussed . </S>"
  ]
}
